title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities              Outdoor Activities         Visitors on a guided canoe/kayak tour NPS / Brandi Nunnalee  Outdoor Programs  Outdoor programs at Hopewell Culture National Historical Park include hiking, bird watching, picnicking, Ranger guided interpretive walks and canoe tours. Outdoor programs may change from year to year, so be sure to check the park Calendar to see what programs are scheduled.  Once there, you can search for programs and activities within your desired date range. To see what guided tours are currently being offered, please visit the Guided Tours page.
